tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Highly recommended! I've met a few OB-GYNs over the last few months, and had given up on finding a doctor who is enthusiastic, positive, friendly and helpful until I met Dr. Geetha Belliappa. Generous with her time, be it during consultations or over phone, she is always available for her patients, to clarify any doubts or to reassure them. 

While most doctors don't bother answering the questions of patients or brush it away as nothing because "they've heard the same questions many times already", Dr. Belliappa takes the time to explain everything because she understands that a pregnancy is a new and unique experience to each new mom. If you're someone who can't help researching an overdose of pregnancy information, consult with Dr. Belliappa because she'll guide you through every query of yours.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
A gem of a doctor. 
She came across as a very down to earth, very approachable person. 
Was very patient with my wife's thousands of questions and doubts which she had on her mind. 
She also prescribes only mediation that is needed and nothing more than that.

tags: None
review: **** ** **** *** ****** **** ***** She is very lively and understands her patients condition very well. I was very scared during my first pregnancy but after meeting her i was very positive and enjoyed my 9 months., and now i am mother of two.. I highly recommend everyone who wants smooth and happy 9 months journey to consult her.  Love u dr. Geetha

tags: None
review: Dr. Geetha Belliappa is the best gynecologist. My wife had difficulty conceiving, we consulted a renowned senior gynecology (in Bangalore) for the past 4 years but unsuccessful. We read good reviews about Dr.Belliappa on internet, we started consulting her, she is friendly, approachable, kind, caring, ************** understands and most importantly a good doctor. Now we are blessed with a beautiful daughter. My wife and I highly recommend Dr. Geetha Belliappa

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Dr Geetha is really approachable and friendly. She understands the problem, hears you out and diagnoses accurately. The stress I was in because of the situation was definitely brought down by just a consultation with her. Will get back to her with my test reports. You might find a lot of gynaecs in Bangalore but she will be on my go to list always. Definitely recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I would like to specifically thank Dr. Geetha Belliappa and her team along with all the nurses’ team in the obstetrics ward who have helped us in every possible way.
My wife delivered healthy baby boy in the month of Aug’18 at Rainbow, Bannarghata Road, Bangalore. I and my wife found the doctor amazing. She is cool headed, very very supportive, ***** ************** We had wanted a normal delivery, and Dr. Geetha Belliappa got it done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was great experience with her. She gave us proper time **** ******* ************. I am Stansfield with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Excellent doctor, one should visit. I started seeing her as soon as I got to know that I am going to be mom. She made me and family very comfortable during this period and at the end I had normal delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is excellent. Just speaking to Dr. Geetha Balliappa was comforting.  She gave time, patiently listened to my problem. Examined and explained. Took away my worries in a matter of 5 minutes.

review: I have been seeing Dr Geetha for more than 6 years now. She is a wonderful doctor who is friendly with patients and explains the issues properly. I have period related issues, she has handled them well. My twin babies were also delivered by her without any hassles.
